role.argrole: person who functions as leader of arg0

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (NP-TMP (NT 去年)) (ADVP (AD 就)) (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP-LGS (P 由) (NP (NN 老师))) (VP (VV 带队)))) (PP (P 和) (NP (QP (CD 三十多) (CLP (M 位))) (NP (NN 学生)))) (VP (VP (VV 到) (NP-OBJ (NN 大陆))) (VP (VCD (VV 参观) (VV 访问)) (QP-EXT (CD 十馀) (CLP (M 天)))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 介绍) (NP-OBJ (NN 大陆) (NN 投资) (NN 环境))))))
